data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jehamalar, E. Eyarin (2015): Strongylovelia lillyae sp. nov. (Hemiptera: Gerromorpha: Veliidae) from Tamil Nadu, India: the first species of the genus described from the Indian subcontinent. Zootaxa 4033 (2): 287-292, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4033.2.9
